title: Help: ID Font
content:

 [‹ id this typeface in logo?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201213753/http:/typophile.com/node/39566 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need to identify this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201213753/http:/typophile.com/node/39586 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mkstudio

comments.content:
Blair, Sackers Gothic, and Engravers Gothic are all close.

- Lex

Could be a slightly modified [Sackers Gothic Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201213753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/sackers-gothic/light/charmap.html) using the small caps..  
 [Aviano Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201213753/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/aviano-sans/) is close too.
